ResearchProjectDef.label: materials science
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct the Matterweaver, capable of creating highly complex compounds, as well as Vanadite, an advanced alloy with unique properties, and Synthread, a spacer-tech cloth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: insulene
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover advanced material fabrication techniques allowing you to produce Insulene, a weak but incredibly insulative fabric.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wood synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to sculpt raw cellulose into wood in the matterweaver.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hyperweave
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the creation of Hyperweave, a highly durable fabric, from Devilstrand, Plasteel, and Synthread.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanoweave
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study nanite energy transfer in order to produce Nanoweave, the pinnacle of fabric design, from Hyperweave and Nanomaterial.

ResearchProjectDef.label: simpod
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design Simpods, virtual reality simulators which allow learning from any number of situations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: universal simpod
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct Universal Simpods, which use AI cores to simulate literally anything a user desires.

ResearchProjectDef.label: exoskeleton
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to assemble exoskeleton belts, which can be worn to improve movement and workspeed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flesh printer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to construct the Flesh Printer, a device capable of printing meat from biomass.

ResearchProjectDef.label: organ assembly
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the secrets of manipulating animal tissue, allowing the printing of organs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ranged shield belt
ResearchProjectDef.description: Usage of AI persona fragments allows shield belts to differentiate between incoming and outgoing projectiles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychic field theory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop a comprehensive theory of psychic behavior and learn how to manipulate this energy with geometry and material science.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychic emanator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use psychic foil to concentrate the psychic output of AI cores, utilizing them to improve the mood of anyone in their radius.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neural network basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct the AI Programming Station and basic operations related to processing AI cores, namely fragmenting them and wiping them for parts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: persona fragmentation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover new algorithms to process AI Persona Fragments, allowing them to be duplicated or programmed from scratch.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI shackling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to prevent AI Personas from revolting by "shackling" their minds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: artificial intelligence mastery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover all the secrets of AI Persona programming, learning to produce full intelligences from scratch among other things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI research assistant
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct AI research rssistants which utilize an AI Persona Core to research topics human minds struggle to comprehend.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vanometrics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use the AI research assistant to engineer vanometric devices which capture a seemingly unlimited source of energy beyond comprehension.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vanometric heat exchange
ResearchProjectDef.description: The AI assistant develops a device which converts ambient energy to and from usable power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy sword
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use vanometric cells to project a short beam of plasma from a handle, creating devastating melee weapons with excellent weight balance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: charge turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize charge weaponry and vanometric cells to produce small, powerful turrets with no external power or maintenance requirements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: orbital mechanics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop advanced launchers capable of putting pods in orbit, and utilize these to put single-use orbital bombardment satellites in place.

ResearchProjectDef.label: asteroid mining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Modify AI cores to construct autonomous space drones which seek out asteroids and process them for resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: deep-space mining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improvements on basic asteroid mining, plus usage of vanometric cells, allows the launching of drones based on full AI personas, which can harvest more and rarer resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: orbital power
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the placement of solar panels on satellites in geostationary orbit which send down power to receptors, day or night. They can also be expended to perform a powerful orbital bombardment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanite fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use a purchased Nano Forge to construct the Nanofabricator, a bench which produces and programs nanites.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanite field projection
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize nanite dispersion technology to project a local field of nanites capable of repairing objects within it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanite repair field
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct larger nanite repair field projectors which repair everything in their radius.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanite healing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Program nanites to quickly close wounds or provide immunity to diseases.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bioaugmentation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combine nanites and genetic reprogramming technology to permanently enhance the user's body without mechanical bionics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanite healing field
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced knowledge of physiology allows the projection of a nanite field which "repairs" damage to living tissue.

ResearchProjectDef.label: glitterworld medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combine medicine, synthread, and nanomaterial to produce more efficacious medicine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: healing mechserum
ResearchProjectDef.description: Integrate glitterworld medicine into a nanite infusion which allows rapid healing of serious injury.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nano forge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use comprehensive knowledge of nanite fabrication to reverse-engineer the nano forge at the heart of the Nanofabricator, allowing the construction of one from raw materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: crafting assistant
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize a Nano Forge to reprogram nanites to print any number of useful components and tools, vastly increasing workers' speed of production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: resurrection mechserum
ResearchProjectDef.description: The AI research assistant unlocks the secrets of life and death, allowing the production of a mechserum which can revive the recently dead.

ResearchProjectDef.label: archotech belt
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct archotech belts which integrate an exoskeleton, repair field, and shield into a single powerful belt.

ResearchProjectDef.label: archotech prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the secret of amazingly advanced prosthetics almost indistinguishable from organic limbs except for their greatly enhanced abilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: luciferium
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the enhancements of Nanite Infusions further to develop the infamous Luciferium, a drug which improves every aspect of a user's life but which has lethal withdrawal symptoms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: infinite chemreactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use nanite field theory to catalyze complex reactions which slowly construct hydrocarbon molecules from elements in the air.

ResearchProjectDef.label: silver vanoreactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Modify the reaction path used by infinite chemreactors to convert energy from vanometric fluctuations into matter.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plasteel vanoreactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize vanometric manipulations of molecules to convert steel into superior plasteel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neurotrainers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Analyze psychic imprintation, neural structure, and simulated behavior to develop neurotrainers, nanite infusions which instantly teach skills to their users.

ResearchProjectDef.label: megascreen television
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improve upon the flatscreen TV using advanced components and a plasteel-based transparent alloy, producing richer colors and more convincing sounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: regeneration pod
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a framework which more efficiently allocates healing nanites, reducing nanomaterial consumption while improving healing quality.
